nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: Smuggler's Run 1 is the first issue of the Star Wars Adventures: Smuggler's Run comic series, a reprint of the previously released miniseries Star Wars: Smuggler's Run. The comic was written by Greg Rucka and Alec Worley, illustrated by Ingo Römling, and released by IDW Publishing on December 23, 2020.

After the Battle of Yavin, Han Solo and Chewbacca intend to use their reward to settle their debts. But Princess Leia asks them to accept a secret mission for the Resistance. Mortal dangers, traitorous enemies, and thorny situations mark the path of these two heroes of the Star Wars saga.
